signals.reason: Price shows consistent higher closes over the last 8 minutes, EMA9 is above EMA21, MACD histogram is positive, RSI is around 68 indicating strength without being overbought, price is near the upper Bollinger Band with bullish candle pattern and no reversal signs. Overall trend is upward.

Bearish momentum: decreasing closes over last 8 minutes, EMA9 below EMA21, RSI around 45, MACD histogram negative, price near lower Bollinger Band, Stochastic below 20, no bullish reversal candlestick patterns detected.

RSI ~58 (bullish), MACD histogram positive, EMA9 > EMA21, price держится выше средней Bollinger и приближается к верхней полосі, Stochastic в зоне 80‑90 (overbought, но тренд сохраняется), формування bullish engulfing після двох падаючих свічок – всі сигнали вказують на короткостроковий підйом.
